Time normalize windows to a standard length

Source: R/window.R
time_normalize_windows.Rd

Time normalize windows to a standard length

Usage

time_normalize_windows(
  x,
  target_samples = 500,
  target_ms = NULL,
  interpolation_method = "linear",
  align_feature = NULL,
  preserve_amplitude = TRUE,
  ...
)
